```{r, include=FALSE}
library(coronavirus)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(data.table)
library(DT)
library(lubridate)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r coronavirus_data }
data("coronavirus")
covid19_Neth <- coronavirus %>%
  filter(country == "Netherlands") %>%
    arrange(date)

```

```{r}
head(covid19_Neth) %>% kable() %>% kable_styling()
```
